description.value: Action Cost: 2 [Combat] actions Range: 60 feet Effect: Target one creature you can see. Make opposed check: your Wisdom + Positive Mastery vs their Wisdom + Luck ([[/save type=will]]). If you win by 1+ net successes, they are Stunned until end of their next turn as Athore's judgment weighs upon them. Usage: Uses 1 Channel Divinity
